extendedInfo.description: Save Battery and manage your cpu with one application. (and free)/!\ Need root device /!\How it's work:It save battery by blocking CPU to it minimum value when we don't need it (when the screen is OFF)\nYou don't need power when your screen is OFF, and your CPU is still using at maximum frequency by program (in background) so this will lock to very low frequency your CPU and permit you to keep battery.Up to 3 days autonomy !!!You can see on one of the pictures:50% battery remaining after more than 24 hours of phone use  (with wifi enabled)How to use settings:The frequence define in "Lock" will be used to lock your cpu at low value."vibrate" option permit to know when the CPU is locked.You can manage CPU settings with this app too.. (without using lock function).An option has been added what permit you to listen music with low CPU set.Ex:If you set 100Mhz at lock, it will not be enought to listen music. The program detect you listen music and set higher CPU Value to permit you listen it..Original value are set back when headset are unplugged..All options included:-Detection of incoming call to restore cpu before answer.-Detection when Music is playing to give enougth power to your phone.-Detection of Clock alarm to permit you to stop it correctly when you wake up.-Rescue Mode if you have any issue with detectionFeel free to ask me by email (email:danez02600gmail.com).If your device hang\freeze on specific value, it's come from your kernel.To make it work, set the next value avalaible.If you like this app, let some stars on market ;)Here is a comment i had  "Simply does what it says it's going to do. Greatly improves battery life !"ROM tested:-Gingerbread-ICS-CM7-CM9-CM10-Jelly BeanPhone tested:Galaxy SGalaxy S2Galaxy S3Galaxy NotesHTCKernel tested:StockSiyahTags: CPU Saver Power Battery saver SGS SGSII SGS2 SGS3 headset Galaxy S Siyah SetCPU Jelly Bean

reviews.title: Working
reviews.comment: I can confirm that it works on sony xperia go, st27i.  Thanks and good job.
reviews.author: Ragib Badaruddin

reviews.title: perfect
reviews.comment: it simply does what it says its gonna do, simple interface easy configeration and it really improves the battery performance, thanks to the developer.
reviews.author: Hosam Elgendy

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: This is the kind of app that you just want to function well so that you can forget about it; in my case it\'s just like it was integrated in the OS... I never experienced an issue with it and it did improve my battery life quite a bit.
reviews.author: Sergione T

reviews.title: Gr8 concept BUT ...
reviews.comment: Like the auto on/off + adjustable lock set.  Does save some battery.  But seems to make my HTC Inc 1 unstable.  It freezes +/or reboots w/o warning. Fix this + I reinstall + gladly give 5 *\'s!
reviews.author: KEITH SCHLESINGER

reviews.title: optimal settings
reviews.comment: thx for this great app. what is the optimal settings for xperia pro?
reviews.author: Tam\303\241s Pflum

reviews.title: Very good
reviews.comment: Great app my phone used to died 6 hours after full battery and now up to 20hrs on stand by
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Forcecloses
reviews.comment: Instantly forcecloses when I try to open the app. I\'m rooted running stock GB.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Almost
reviews.comment: I\'m giving this 3 stars because of two reasons. One the constant annoying notification every time I unlock the screen. Two, setting the cpu is not very intuitive at all. That\'s fine, but then a better tutorial is necessary.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Does what it says but would be nice if alert that tells me frequency has been restored to my max setting upon screen being turned on could be disabled.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Must have for Galaxy Phones !
reviews.comment: Simply does what it says it\'s going to do.  Greatly improves battery life !
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Useless
reviews.comment: Always force closes. My galaxy pocket is rooted but always freezes. Uninstalling this piece of crap...don\'t even think of downloading this crap!!!
reviews.author: weezy mazyopa

reviews.title: Awful
reviews.comment: Turned my phone into a vegetable while I had it...
reviews.author: Michael Arduino
